Package Control

Class Booking_Controller

java.lang.Object
Control.Booking_Controller
public class Booking_Controller extends Object
Controller for the booking of movies.

      public void addBooking(double TotalAmount, Entity.Cinema cinema, Entity.Movie movie, ArrayList<Entity.Ticket> ticketList, Entity.MovieGoer user, Entity.Cineplex cineplex)
      Function to add in a new booking.
      Parameters:
      TotalAmount - The booking's total amount.
      cinema - The booking's cinema.
      movie - The booking's movie.
      ticketList - The booking's ticketlist.
      user - The booking's MovieGoer.
      cineplex - The booking's cineplex.

      Returns:
